summary: We testified about the Department of Homeland Security’s efforts to ensure equal opportunity in employment at DHS. For example, DHS uses things like employee surveys to help identify potential barriers and reported some improvements in representation of minorities and women from FY 2014 through 2017. However, it lacks performance metrics for tracking its progress. Last year, we made 6 recommendations to DHS, including that it...
title: Equal Employment Opportunity: DHS Could Better Address Challenges to Ensuring EEO in Its Workforce
